title: One test failure and one error with git 2.16.0
body:
https://lwn.net/Articles/744749/

New release, has many changes relating to submodules handling. Would be good to check if no new issues or incompatibilities, and report here... Reporting with #2090 , on 0.9.x branch I observe:
```shell
$> DATALAD_TESTS_SSH=1 PATH=/home/yoh/proj/misc/git/INSTALL-2.16.1/bin:$PATH DATALAD_USE_DEFAULT_GIT=true python -m nose -s -v datalad.distribution.tests.test_uninstall:{test_drop_nocrash_absent_subds,test_uninstall_without_super}
datalad.distribution.tests.test_uninstall.test_drop_nocrash_absent_subds ... ERROR
datalad.distribution.tests.test_uninstall.test_uninstall_without_super ... FAIL
Versions: appdirs=1.4.3 boto=2.44.0 cmd:annex=6.20171211+gitgba511f4de-1~ndall+1 cmd:git=2.16.1 cmd:system-git=2.16.1 cmd:system-ssh=7.6p1 git=2.1.8 gitdb=2.0.2 humanize=0.5.1 iso8601=0.1.11 msgpack=0.4.8 requests=2.18.4 scrapy=1.4.0 six=1.11.0 tqdm=4.19.5 wrapt=1.9.0

======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.distribution.tests.test_uninstall.test_drop_nocrash_absent_subds
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nose/case.py", line 197, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 627, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/distribution/tests/test_uninstall.py", line 522, in test_drop_nocrash_absent_subds
    assert_status('notneeded', drop('.', recursive=True))
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 437, in eval_func
    return return_func(generator_func)(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 425, in return_func
    results = list(results)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 382, in generator_func
    result_renderer, result_xfm, _result_filter, **_kwargs):
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 449, in _process_results
    for res in results:
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/distribution/drop.py", line 217, in __call__
    handle_dirty_dataset(ds, mode=if_dirty)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 100, in handle_dirty_dataset
    raise RuntimeError('dataset {} is not yet installed'.format(ds))
RuntimeError: dataset <Dataset path=/tmp/datalad_temp_test_drop_nocrash_absent_subds1F46lj/sub> is not yet installed
-------------------- >> begin captured logging << --------------------
datalad.utils: Level 5: Importing datalad.utils
datalad.utils: Level 5: Done importing datalad.utils
datalad.cmd: Level 9: Will use default git /home/yoh/proj/misc/git/INSTALL-2.16.1/bin/git
datalad.cmd: Level 9: Running: ['git', 'version']
datalad.cmd: Level 8: Finished running ['git', 'version'] with status 0
datalad.cmd: Level 9: Running: ['git', 'config', '-z', '-l', '--show-origin']
datalad.cmd: Level 8: Finished running ['git', 'config', '-z', '-l', '--show-origin'] with status 0
datalad.ui: Level 5: Starting importing ui
datalad.ui.dialog: Level 5: Starting importing ui.dialog
datalad.ui.dialog: Level 5: Done importing ui.dialog
datalad.ui: Level 5: Initiating UI switcher
datalad.ui: DEBUG: UI set to DialogUI(out=<file>)
datalad.ui: Level 5: Done importing ui
--------------------- >> end captured logging << ---------------------

======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.distribution.tests.test_uninstall.test_uninstall_without_super
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nose/case.py", line 197, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 627, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/distribution/tests/test_uninstall.py", line 506, in test_uninstall_without_super
    assert_result_count(subreport, 1, path=sub.path, state='absent')
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 1185, in assert_result_count
    dumps(results, indent=1, default=lambda x: "<not serializable>")))
AssertionError: Got 0 instead of 1 expected results matching {'path': '/tmp/datalad_temp_test_uninstall_without_superQr8FHA/sub', 'state': 'absent'}. Inspected 1 record(s):
[
 {
  "status": "ok", 
  "gitmodule_name": "sub", 
  "parentds": "/tmp/datalad_temp_test_uninstall_without_superQr8FHA", 
  "state": "clean", 
  "revision_descr": "(null)", 
  "gitmodule_url": "./sub", 
  "action": "subdataset", 
  "path": "/tmp/datalad_temp_test_uninstall_without_superQr8FHA/sub", 
  "type": "dataset", 
  "refds": "/tmp/datalad_temp_test_uninstall_without_superQr8FHA", 
  "revision": "8dd60313164ed7d521cd4608bc2179f60d6c0930"
 }
]

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Ran 2 tests in 4.378s

FAILED (errors=1, failures=1)
```
whenever it is all kosher if without that new git:
```shell
$> DATALAD_TESTS_SSH=1 PATH=/home/yoh/proj/misc/git/INSTALL-2.16.1/bin:$PATH python -m nose -s -v datalad.distribution.tests.test_uninstall:{test_drop_nocrash_absent_subds,test_uninstall_without_super}        
datalad.distribution.tests.test_uninstall.test_drop_nocrash_absent_subds ... ok
datalad.distribution.tests.test_uninstall.test_uninstall_without_super ... ok
Versions: appdirs=1.4.3 boto=2.44.0 cmd:annex=6.20171211+gitgba511f4de-1~ndall+1 cmd:git=2.11.0 cmd:system-git=2.16.1 cmd:system-ssh=7.6p1 git=2.1.8 gitdb=2.0.2 humanize=0.5.1 iso8601=0.1.11 msgpack=0.4.8 requests=2.18.4 scrapy=1.4.0 six=1.11.0 tqdm=4.19.5 wrapt=1.9.0
```
